info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cabarrus, southeastern Iredell, north central Mecklenburg and southwestern Rowan Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Huntersville, or near Mooresville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kannapolis, Cornelius, Mooresville, Davidson, Landis, Enochville, Coddle Creek Reservoir, China Grove, Lake Norman and Mount Ulla. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
